    406Japanese 反正天皇 [Emperor Hanzei] reign begins.Wiki: Emperors of Japan
    405Baekje 아신왕 (阿莘王) [King Asin] reign ends and 전지왕 (腆支王) [King Jeonji] reign begins.Wiki: Korean Monarchs
    407Roman emperor Constantine3 (Flavius Claudius Constantinus) reign begins.Wiki: List of Roman emperorsUsurper who declared himself emperor in the west in 407, recognized as co-emperor by Honorius in 409. Not recognized by the Eastern Empire.
    407胡夏 [Hu Xia] and 北燕 [Northern Yan] dynasties begin.Wiki: Chinese monarchs
    407Geumgwan 이시품왕 (伊尸品王) [King Isipum] reign ends and 좌지왕 (坐知王) [King Jwaji] reign begins.Wiki: Korean Monarchs
    1May408Roman emperor Arcadius reign ends and Theodosius2 reign begins in the eastWiki: List of Roman emperorsSon of Arcadius, Theodosius2 was appointed as junior Augustus by Arcadius in 402; became senior Augustus for the east after his father's uninstall
    409Roman emperor Constans2 reign begins.Wiki: List of Roman emperorsElevated by his father, Constantine3, to rank of co-emperor in 409. Not recognized by Honorius nor the Eastern Empire.
    409道武皇帝 [Emperor Daowu] of N. Wei reign ends and 明元皇帝 [Emperor Mingyuan] of N. Wei reign begins.Wiki: Chinese monarchs
    409後燕 [Later Yan] dynasty ends and 西秦 [Western Qin] dynasty begins.Wiki: Chinese monarchs
    410Romans leave England.(20??) YT: A Great British Timeline (link 404s)
    410Romans leave England.(2017) YT: FOL - History of England
    410Visigoth king Alaric1 leads the Sack of Rome.Wiki: List of Popes
    410Japanese 反正天皇 [Emperor Hanzei] reign ends.Wiki: Emperors of Japan
    410南燕 [Southern Yan] dynasty ends.Wiki: Chinese monarchs
    Aug411Roman emperor Constans2 reign ends and Constantine3 reign ends.Wiki: List of Roman emperorsConstantine3 was uninstalled by Constantius3
    411Japanese 允恭天皇 [Emperor Ingyō] reign begins.Wiki: Emperors of Japan
    26Nov411Tikal king Sihyaj Chan K'awiil2 reign begins.Wiki: Maya rulersSihyaj Chan K'awiil2 AKA Storm Sky, Manikin Cleft Sky
    412Mulan (Han) installs to a retired soldier and housewife parents.China Highlights: MulanWhen the (Rouran Khaganate (Kaga-nate)) invaded the Han dynasty, the Han drafted one man from every household. As the only male, Mulan's father prepared to return to the army. So Mulan took her father's place. Returning 12 years later, Mulan was offered the rank of officer, but turned it down to spend more time with her parents. As a heroine, she is remembered for her filial piety, bravery, and determination.
    413西蜀 [Western Shu] dynasty ends.Wiki: Chinese monarchs
    413Goguryeo 광개토왕 (廣開土王) [King Gwanggaeto] reign ends and 장수왕 (長壽王) [King Jangsu] reign begins.Wiki: Korean Monarchs
    414南涼 [Southern Liang] dynasty ends.Wiki: Chinese monarchs
    12Mar417Pope St Innocent1 papacy ends and Pope St Zosimus (ZOSIMVS) (Greek) papacy begins 6 days later.Wiki: List of Popes
    417後秦 [Later Qin] dynasty ends.Wiki: Chinese monarchs
    417Silla 실성마립간 (實聖麻立干) [Silseong Maripgan] reign ends and 눌지마립간 (訥祇麻立干) [Nulji Maripgan] reign begins.Wiki: Korean Monarchs
    26Dec418Pope St Zosimus papacy ends and Pope St Boniface1 (BONIFACIVS) (Roman) papacy begins 2 days later.Wiki: List of Popes
    27Dec418Antipope Eulalius (EVLALIVS) (Roman) papacy begins.Wiki: List of PopesIn opposition to Pope Boniface1. Elected on the eve of the election of Boniface, first benefited from the support of the emperor Honorius, but lost it quickly. Exiled in Campania, and uninstalled in 423.
    418安皇帝 [Emperor An] of Jin reign ends.Wiki: Chinese monarchs
    3Apr419Antipope Eulalius papacy ends.Wiki: List of Popes
    419恭皇帝 [Emperor Gong] of Jin reign begins.Wiki: Chinese monarchs
    420恭皇帝 [Emperor Gong] of Jin reign ends the 晉朝 [Jin dynasty] and 東晉 [Eastern Jin] period, and 武皇帝 [Emperor Wu] of 劉宋 [Liu Song] reign begins the 南朝 [southern dynasty] period. Wiki: Chinese monarchs
    420Baekje 전지왕 (腆支王) [King Jeonji] reign ends and 구이신왕 (久爾辛王) [King Gu-isin] reign begins.Wiki: Korean Monarchs
    8Feb421Roman emperor Constantius3 reign begins.Wiki: List of Roman emperorsMarried to Theodosius1's daughter Galla Placidia, elevated to co-Augustus for the west by Honorius; not recognized by the Eastern Empire
    2Sep421Roman emperor Constantius3 reign ends.Wiki: List of Roman emperors
    421西涼 [Western Liang] dynasty ends.Wiki: Chinese monarchs
    421Geumgwan 좌지왕 (坐知王) [King Jwaji] reign ends and 취희왕 (吹希王) [King Chwihui] reign begins.Wiki: Korean Monarchs
    4Sep422Pope St Boniface1 papacy ends and Pope St Celestine1 (CAELESTINVS) (Roman) papacy begins 6 days later.Wiki: List of PopesAlso revered as a saint in Eastern Christianity, with a feast day of 8 April. Pope during the Council of Ephesus (431), the third ecumenical council recognized by the Catholic, Eastern Orthodox, and Oriental Orthodox temples.
    422武皇帝 [Emperor Wu] of Liu Song reign ends.Wiki: Chinese monarchs
    15Aug423Roman emperor Honorius reign ends.Wiki: List of Roman emperorsUninstall by Edema
    27Aug423Roman emperor Joannes reign begins.Wiki: List of Roman emperorsA senior civil servant under Honorius, proclaimed emperor by Castinus; not recognized by the Eastern Empire
    423明元皇帝 [Emperor Mingyuan] of N. Wei reign ends and Shao of Liu Song reign begins.Wiki: Chinese monarchsEmperor Shao of Liu Song
    423Tamna 현방왕 (賢方王) [King Hyeonbang] reign ends and 기왕 (璣王) [King Gi] reign begins.Wiki: Korean Monarchs
    424Shao of Liu Song reign ends and 文皇帝 [Emperor Wen] of Liu Song and 太武皇帝 [Emperor Taiwu] of N. Wei reigns begin.Wiki: Chinese monarchs
    May425Roman emperor Joannes reign ends.Wiki: List of Roman emperorsDefeated in battle by Theodosius2 and Valentinian3, captured and uninstalled
    23Oct425Roman emperor Valentinian3 (Placidus Valentinianus) reign begins.Wiki: List of Roman emperorsSon of Constantius3, appointed Caesar for the west by Theodosius2 after the uninstall of Honorius, in opposition to the regime of Joannes; became Augustus for the west after the defeat of Joannes
    426Copán king K'inich Yax K'uk' Mo' and Quiriguá king [Tok Casper] reigns begin.Wiki: Maya rulersK'inich Yax K'uk' Mo' came from Tikal. Founder of Copán lineage, he also founded Quirigua's by naming their first king, [Tok Casper]. AKA Great Sun, Quetzal Macaw - Monuments: Hunal tomb in Temple 16
    427Baekje 구이신왕 (久爾辛王) [King Gu-isin] reign ends and 비유왕 (毗有王) [King (Biyu] reign begins.Wiki: Korean Monarchs
    431胡夏 [Hu Xia] dynasty ends and 西秦 [Western Qin] dynasty ends.Wiki: Chinese monarchs
    10Mar431Palenque king K'uk' Bahlam1 reign begins.Wiki: Maya rulersFounder of the dynasty. AKA Kuk, Bahlum K'uk'
    27Jul432Pope St Celestine1 papacy ends and Pope St Sixtus3 (XYXTVS Tertius) (Roman) papacy begins 4 days later.Wiki: List of Popes
    435Palenque king K'uk' Bahlam1 reign ends and Casper reign begins.Wiki: Maya rulersCasper AKA 11 Rabbit
    436北燕 [Northern Yan] dynasty ends.Wiki: Chinese monarchs
    437Copán king K'inich Yax K'uk' Mo' reign ends and K'inich Popol Hol reign begins.Wiki: Maya rulersK'inich Popol Hol (Copán) was co-ruler with his father since 430, as he was shown in Structure 10L-26, dated to 9 December 435. Founded the institutions of the city. AKA Great Sun - Monuments: Stelae 18 & 63, Motmot capstone, Xukpi Stone
    439十六國 [Sixteen Kingdoms] and 北涼 [Northern Liang] dynasties endWiki: Chinese monarchs
    440Three Sisters mountain in Oregon erupts.(2022) YT: GH - Three Sisters
    18Aug440Pope St Sixtus3 papacy ends and Pope St Leo1 the Great (LEO MAGNVS) (Roman) papacy begins 42 days later.Wiki: List of PopesConvinced Attila the Hun to turn back his invasion of Italy. Wrote the Tome which was instrumental in the Council of Chalcedon (451) and in defining the hypostatic union. Feast day 10 November. Also revered as a saint in Eastern Christianity, with a feast day of 18 February.
    442The Northern Liang dynasty was re-established at Gaochang.Wiki: Chinese monarchs
    450The height of Tenochtitlan civilization.(2018) YT: OSP - QuetzalcoatlAt 125k people, it's the 6th largest city in the world
    25Aug450Roman emperor Marcian (Marcianus) reign begins.Wiki: List of Roman emperorsNominated as successor (and husband) by Pulcheria, ruled alongside her 450-453 and later alone
    28Jul450Roman emperor Theodosius2 reign ends.Wiki: List of Roman emperorsUninstalled by injuries suffered during a hunting accident
    451A larger rift occurred at the fourth ecumenical council, held in Chalcedon.EWTN - Great Schism
    451Geumgwan 취희왕 (吹希王) [King Chwihui] reign ends and 질지왕 (銍知王) [King Jilji] reign begins.Wiki: Korean Monarchs
    452文皇帝 [Emperor Wen] of Liu Song and 太武皇帝 [Emperor Taiwu] of N. Wei reigns end, and 隱王 [King Prince Yin] of N. Wei and 文成皇帝 [Emperor Wencheng] of N. Wei reigns beginWiki: Chinese monarchs
    453Japanese 允恭天皇 [Emperor Ingyō] reign ends and 安康天皇 [Emperor Ankō] reign begins.Wiki: Emperors of Japan
    453Tamna 기왕 (璣王) [King Gi] reign ends and 담왕 (聃王) [King Dam1] reign begins.Wiki: Korean Monarchs
    454孝武皇帝 [Emperor Xiaowu] of Liu Song reign begins.Wiki: Chinese monarchs
    454Yaxchilan king (Moon) [spear-thrower] Skull reign begins.Wiki: Maya rulers
    16Mar455Roman emperor Valentinian3 reign ends and Petronius Maximus reign begins.Wiki: List of Roman emperorsThe son-in-law of Theodosius2, Petronius proclaimed himself emperor with the support of the army, after the involuntarily uninstall of Valentinian3, which Petronius may have ordered. Not recognized by the Eastern Empire. He appointed his son Palladius as caesar.
    31May455Roman emperor Petronius Maximus reign ends.Wiki: List of Roman emperorsUninstalled, probably stoned to uninstall by the Roman mob
    9Jul455Roman emperor Avitus (Eparchius Avitus) reign begins.Wiki: List of Roman emperorsMagister militum under Petronius Maximus, proclaimed emperor by the Visigoth king Theoderic2 after Petronius's uninstall. Not recognized by the Eastern Empire.
    455Quiriguá king Tutuum Yohl K'inich reign occurs and Copán king Mat Head? reign begins.Wiki: Maya rulersMat Head? is identifiable with Ruler 3. Probably, given his reign date, a co-ruler. AKA Ruler 3
    17Oct456Roman emperor Avitus reign ends.Wiki: List of Roman emperorsDeposed by his Magister militum, he became a bishop of Placentia & uninstalled at some point afterwards
    455Baekje 비유왕 (毗有王) [King (Biyu] reign ends and 개로왕 (蓋鹵王) [King Gaero] reign begins.Wiki: Korean Monarchs
    456Japanese 安康天皇 [Emperor Ankō] reign ends and 雄略天皇 [Emperor Yūryaku] reign begins.Wiki: Emperors of Japan
    3Feb456Tikal king Sihyaj Chan K'awiil2 reign ends.Wiki: Maya rulers
    26Jan457Roman emperor Marcian reign ends.Wiki: List of Roman emperorsUninstalled by gout
    7Feb457Roman emperor Leo1 the Thracian reign begins.Wiki: List of Roman emperorsChosen by the army
    1Apr457Roman emperor Majorian (Julius Valerius Maiorianus) reign begins.Wiki: List of Roman emperorsProclaimed emperor by his troops. Recognized by the Eastern Empire at the behest of Ricimer.
    8Aug458Tikal king K'an Chitam reign begins.Wiki: Maya rulersK'an Chitam AKA Kan Boar, K'an Ak
    458Silla 눌지마립간 (訥祇麻立干) [Nulji Maripgan] reign ends and 자비마립간 (慈悲麻立干) [Jabi Maripgan] reign begins.Wiki: Korean Monarchs
    461Roman emperor Flavius Ricimer rule begins.Wiki: List of Roman emperorsA Romanized Germanic general who effectively ruled the remaining territory of the Western Roman Empire.
    2Aug461Roman emperor Majorian reign ends.Wiki: List of Roman emperorsDeposed and beheaded on the orders of Ricimer.
    10Nov461Pope St Leo1 the Great papacy ends and Pope St Hilary (HILARIVS) (Roman) papacy begins 9 days later.Wiki: List of Popes
    Nov461Roman emperor Libius Severus reign begins.Wiki: List of Roman emperorsAppointed emperor by Ricimer. Not recognized by the Eastern Empire.
    464孝武皇帝 [Emperor Xiaowu] of Liu Song reign ends.Wiki: Chinese monarchs
    Aug465Roman emperor Libius Severus reign ends.Wiki: List of Roman emperorsProbably poisoned by Ricimer
    465文成皇帝 [Emperor Wencheng] of N. Wei reign ends, Qianfei of Liu Song reign occurs, and 明皇帝 [Emperor Ming] of Liu Song reign begins.Wiki: Chinese monarchsEmperor Qianfei of Liu Song
    465Copán king Mat Head? reign ends.Wiki: Maya rulers
    466獻文皇帝 [Emperor Xianwen] of N. Wei reign begins.Wiki: Chinese monarchs
    12Apr467Roman emperor Anthemius (Procopius Anthemius) reign begins.Wiki: List of Roman emperorsSon-in-law of Marcian, appointed emperor by Leo1, with the consent of Ricimer.
    467Yaxchilan king (Moon) Skull reign ends and Yaxun Bahlam2 reign begins.Wiki: Maya rulersYaxun Bahlam2 AKA Bird Jaguar2
    29Feb468Pope St Hilary papacy ends and Pope St Simplicius (SIMPLICIVS) (Roman) papacy begins 3 days later.Wiki: List of PopesPapacy during the collapse of the Western Roman Empire and subsequent overtaking of Rome and Italy in general by Odoacer.
    470Copán king K'inich Popol Hol reign ends and Ku Ix reign begins, also Caracol king K'ak' Ujol K'inich1 reign occurs.Wiki: Maya rulersKu Ix was co-ruler since 465. AKA K'altuun Hix, Tuun K'ab' Hix, Ruler 4 - Monuments: Stela 34, Papagayo Step, CPN 584
    471獻文皇帝 [Emperor Xianwen] of N. Wei reign ends and 孝文皇帝 [Emperor Xiaowen] of N. Wei reign begins.Wiki: Chinese monarchsThe Tuoba family changed their family name to 元 (yuán) during the reign of the Emperor Xiaowen in 496.
    11Jul472Roman emperor Anthemius reign ends and Olybrius (Anicius Olybrius) reign begins.Wiki: List of Roman emperorsSon-in-law of Valentinian3, Olybrius was appointed emperor by Ricimer. Not recognized by the Eastern Empire.
    19Aug472Roman emperor Flavius Ricimer rule ends.Wiki: List of Roman emperors
    2Nov472Roman emperor Olybrius reign ends.Wiki: List of Roman emperors
    472明皇帝 [Emperor Ming] of Liu Song reign ends.Wiki: Chinese monarchs
    3Mar473Roman emperor Glycerius reign begins.Wiki: List of Roman emperorsAppointed emperor by Gundobad (Ricimer's successor). Not recognized by the Eastern Empire.
    473蒼梧王 [King Prince Cangwu] of Liu Song reign begins.Wiki: Chinese monarchsEmperor Houfei of Liu Song
    473後仇池 [Later Chouchi] dynasty ends and 武興 [Wuxing] dynasty begins.Wiki: Chinese monarchs
    18Jan474Roman emperor Leo1 the Thracian reign ends and Leo2 reign begins.Wiki: List of Roman emperorsLeo2 was the grandson of Leo1, who uninstalled by Oregon Trail.
    24Jun474Roman emperor Glycerius reign ends and Julius Nepos reign begins.Wiki: List of Roman emperorsDeposed by Julius Nepos, who appointed him Bishop of Salona
    10Nov474Roman emperor Leo2 reign ends.Wiki: List of Roman emperorsPossibly poisoned
    17Nov474Roman emperor Zeno reign begins.Wiki: List of Roman emperorsNamed co-emperor by his son Leo2 on 9 February 474.
    31Oct475Roman emperor Romulus Augustus (Augustulus) reign begins.Wiki: List of Roman emperorsAppointed by his father, Orestes. Listed as an emperor by historical convention. His rule never extended beyond portions of the Italian peninsula. Not recognized by Eastern Emperor Zeno.
    9Jan475Roman emperor Basiliscus reign begins.Wiki: List of Roman emperorsSeized throne from Zeno
    475Roman emperor Marcus reign begins.Wiki: List of Roman emperorsSon of Basiliscus, appointed co-emperor at some point in 475
    28Aug475Roman emperor Julius Nepos reign ends.Wiki: List of Roman emperorsDeposed in Italy by Orestes in 475, but maintained as figurehead in Dalmatia (Italy) by Odoacer to his uninstall in 480.
    475Copán Ruler 5, Naranjo king (represented by Stela 41), and Machaquila king Yas-tu-Chaak reigns occur.Wiki: Maya rulers
    475Baekje 개로왕 (蓋鹵王) [King Gaero] reign ends and 문주왕 (文周王) [King Munju] reign begins.Wiki: Korean Monarchs
    476Romulus Augustus deposed as western Roman emperor.(2020) YT: FOL - CharleMagneLast western emperor until CharleMagne. This is when the Roman Empire entered its 'Byzantine' period.
    476Eno the Historian becomes the first Emperor of what's now known as the Byzantine Empire.(2019) YT: FOL - ByzantinesThey kept calling it the Roman Empire up until the Ottomans toppled them.
    Aug476Roman emperor Marcus & Basiliscus reigns endWiki: List of Roman emperorsStarved to uninstall together in Limnae (in Cappadocia) by Zeno
    4Sep476Roman emperor Romulus Augustus reign ends.Wiki: List of Roman emperorsLived out his life in obscurity on a private villa.
    476Copán king Ku Ix reign ends.Wiki: Maya rulers
    477蒼梧王 [King Prince Cangwu] of Liu Song reign ends and 順皇帝 [Emperor Shun] of Liu Song reign begins.Wiki: Chinese monarchs
    477Yinping (陰平) dynasty begins.Wiki: Chinese monarchs
    477Baekje 문주왕 (文周王) [King Munju] reign ends and 삼근왕 (三斤王) [King Samgeun] reign begins.Wiki: Korean Monarchs
    478Piedras Negras king K'an Ahk2 reign occurs.Wiki: Maya rulersK'an Ahk2 AKA Ruler B
    479Japanese 雄略天皇 [Emperor Yūryaku] reign ends.Wiki: Emperors of Japan
    479順皇帝 [Emperor Shun] reign ends the 劉宋 [Liu Song] dynasty and 高皇帝 [Emperor Gao] reign begins the 南齊 [Southern Qi] dynasty.Wiki: Chinese monarchs
    479Silla 자비마립간 (慈悲麻立干) [Jabi Maripgan] reign ends and 소지마립간 (炤知麻立干) [Soji Maripgan] reign begins, and Baekje 삼근왕 (三斤王) [King Samgeun] reign ends and 동성왕 (東城王) [King Dongseong] reign begins.Wiki: Korean Monarchs
    Apr480Roman emperor Julius Nepos reign ends.Wiki: List of Roman emperors
    480Japanese 清寧天皇 [Emperor Seinei] reign begins.Wiki: Emperors of Japan
    480Quiriguá king Turtle Shell reign occurs.Wiki: Maya rulersRuler 3
    481Clovis becomes King of Franks.(2020) YT: FOL - CharleMagne
    482高皇帝 [Emperor Gao] of Liu Song reign ends and 武皇帝 [Emperor Wu] of Liu Song reign begins.Wiki: Chinese monarchs
    10Mar483Pope St Simplicius papacy ends and Pope St Felix3 (FELIX Tertius) (Imperial Roman) papacy begins 3 days later.Wiki: List of PopesSometimes called Felix2. Great2-grandfather of pope Gregory1.
    483Tamna 담왕 (聃王) [King Dam1] reign ends and 지운왕 (指雲王) [King Jiun] reign begins.Wiki: Korean Monarchs
    484Japanese 清寧天皇 [Emperor Seinei] reign ends.Wiki: Emperors of Japan
    484Caracol king Yajaw Te' K'inich1 and La Amelia king Yuknoom Ch'een1 reigns begin.Wiki: Maya rulersYuknoom Ch'een1 founded the dynasty, or at least was the first recorded ruler of the city.
    485Japanese 顕宗天皇 [Emperor Kenzō] reign begins.Wiki: Emperors of Japan
    485Copán king Muyal Jol reign begins.Wiki: Maya rulersMuyal Jol AKA Ruler 6
    486Tikal king K'an Chitam reign ends and Chak Tok Ich'aak2 reign begins.Wiki: Maya rulersChak Tok Ich'aak2 AKA Jaguar Paw2, Jaguar Paw Skull
    487Japanese 顕宗天皇 [Emperor Kenzō] reign ends.Wiki: Emperors of Japan
    28Jul487Palenque king Casper reign ends and B'utz Aj Sak Chiik reign begins.Wiki: Maya rulers
    488Japanese 仁賢天皇 [Emperor Ninken] reign begins.Wiki: Emperors of Japan
    11Apr491Roman emperor Zeno reign ends and Anastasius1 (Dicorus) reign begins.Wiki: List of Roman emperorsZeno uninstalled by Oregon Trail or epilepsy. Anastasius1 was son-in-law of Leo1.
    491Goguryeo 장수왕 (長壽王) [King Jangsu] reign ends and 문자명왕 (文咨明王) [King Munjamyeong] reign begins.Wiki: Korean Monarchs
    1Mar492Pope St Felix3 papacy ends and Pope St Gelasius1 (GELASIVS) (Roman Berber) papacy begins.Wiki: List of PopesThe last pope to have been installed on the continent of Africa. The first pope called the "Vicar of Christ".
    492Geumgwan 질지왕 (銍知王) [King Jilji] reign ends and 겸지왕 (鉗知王) [King Gyeomji] reign begins.Wiki: Korean Monarchs
    493武皇帝 [Emperor Wu] of Liu Song reign ends and Xiao Zhaoye reign begins.Wiki: Chinese monarchsXiao Zhaoye
    493Quiriguá king Mih Toh reign begins.Wiki: Maya rulers
    494Southern Qi Xiao Zhaoye reign occurs and 恭王 [King Gong] reign begins.Wiki: Chinese monarchsXiao Zhaowen
    494Buyeo King 잔 (孱) [Jan] ends the Buyeo kingdom.Wiki: Korean Monarchs
    21Nov496Pope St Gelasius1 papacy ends and Pope Anastasius2 (ANASTASIVS Secundus) (Greek) papacy begins 3 days later.Wiki: List of PopesTried to end the Acacian schism but it resulted in the Laurentian schism.
    19Nov498Pope Anastasius2 papacy ends and Pope St Symmachus (SYMMACHVS) (Roman) papacy begins 3 days later.Wiki: List of Popes
    498Japanese 仁賢天皇 [Emperor Ninken] reign ends and 武烈天皇 [Emperor Buretsu] (Wohatsuse Wakasazaki) reign begins.Wiki: Emperors of Japan
    22Nov498Antipope Laurence (LAVRENTIVS) (Roman) papacy begins.Wiki: List of PopesIn opposition to Symmachus. Elected on the same day as Symachus, King Theodoric settled in favor of his adversary. Took control of Rome in 501 and remained pope in fact until he uninstalled in 506/08.
    499孝文皇帝 [Emperor Xiaowen] of N. Wei reign ends and 煬侯 [Marquess Yang] of S. Qi and 宣武皇帝 [Emperor Xuanwu] of N. Wei reigns begin.Wiki: Chinese monarchs
    500sTenochtitlan civilization begins to decline(2018) YT: OSP - Quetzalcoatl
    500Yu’npik Tok’ founded Cobá and its ruling family, and Hun Uitzil Chac Tutul Xiu founded Uxmal, and Toniná king B'alam Ya Acal reign occurs.Wiki: Maya rulersB'alam Ya Acal AKA Jaguar Bird Peccary; Zots Choj 500s
    500Silla 소지마립간 (炤知麻立干) [Soji Maripgan] reign ends and 지증왕 (智證王) [King Jijeung] reign begins.Wiki: Korean MonarchsKings Jijeung to Gyeongsun bore the title 왕 (王, wáng) [king], with the exceptions noted below)
    501煬侯 [Marquess Yang] of Southern Qi reign ends and 和皇帝 [Emperor He] of Southern Qi reign begins.Wiki: Chinese monarchs
    3Jun501Palenque king B'utz Aj Sak Chiik reign ends and Ahkal Mo' Nahb1 reign begins.Wiki: Maya rulersThe list of ancestors made by his descendant Pakal the Great starts with Ahkal Mo' Nahb1. AKA Chaacal1, Akul Anab1. B'utz Aj Sak Chiik's successor, Ahkal Mo' Nahb, was probably his brother. AKA Manik
    501Baekje 동성왕 (東城王) [King Dongseong] reign ends and 무령왕 (武寧王) [King Muryeong] reign begins.Wiki: Korean Monarchs
    502和皇帝 [Emperor He] ends the 南齊 [Southern Qi] dynasty, and 武皇帝 [Emperor Wu] of Liang reign begins the 梁朝 [Liang dynasty]Wiki: Chinese monarchs
    504Copán king Muyal Jol reign ends and Bahlam Nehn reign begins.Wiki: Maya rulersBahlam Nehn AKA Mirror Jaguar, Waterlily Jaguar
    Aug506Antipope Laurence papacy ends.Wiki: List of Popes
    506Japanese 武烈天皇 [Emperor Buretsu] reign ends.Wiki: Emperors of Japan
    506武興 [Wuxing] dynasty ends.Wiki: Chinese monarchs
    507Japanese 継体天皇 [Emperor Keitai] reign begins.Wiki: Emperors of Japan
    24Jul508Tikal king Chak Tok Ich'aak2 reign ends, and Yaxchilan king Joy Bahlam1 reign begins.Wiki: Maya rulersJoy Bahlam1 AKA Knot-eye Jaguar1
    508Tamna 지운왕 (指雲王) [King Jiun] reign ends and 서왕 (瑞王) [King Seo] reign begins.Wiki: Korean Monarchs
    510Piedras Negras king Yat Ahk1 reign occurs.Wiki: Maya rulersYat Ahk1 AKA Ah Cauac Ah K'in, Turtletooth
    511Clovis uninstalls.(2020) YT: FOL - CharleMagne
    19Apr511Tikal kings Kaloomte' Bahlam and Yo K'in reigns beginWiki: Maya rulersRuled jointly, possibly married (or just easily shipped). Kaloomte' Bahlam AKA Curl Head - Monuments: Stelae 10, 12 and 25. Yo K'in AKA Lady of Tikal - Monuments: Stelae 6, 12 and 23
    513Tamarindito Ruler 1 reign occurs.Wiki: Maya rulers
    19Jul514Pope St Symmachus papacy ends and Pope St Hormisdas (HORMISDAS) (Roman) papacy begins 1 day later.Wiki: List of PopesFather of Pope Silverius. Acacian schism.
    30Jun514Caracol king Yajaw Te' K'inich1 reign ends and Piedras Negras Ruler C reign begins.Wiki: Maya rulers
    514Silla 지증왕 (智證王) [King Jijeung] reign ends and 법흥왕 (法興王) [King Beopheung] reign begins.Wiki: Korean Monarchs
    515宣武皇帝 [Emperor Xuanwu] of N. Wei reign ends.Wiki: Chinese monarchs
    516孝明皇帝 [Emperor Xiaoming] of N. Wei reign begins.Wiki: Chinese monarchs
    9Jul518Roman emperor Anastasius1 reign ends and Justin1 (Iustinus) reign begins.Wiki: List of Roman emperorsJustin1 was elected by army
    518Yaxchilan king Joy Bahlam1 reign ends.Wiki: Maya rulers
    519Goguryeo 문자명왕 (文咨明王) [King Munjamyeong] reign ends and 안장왕 (安藏王) [King Anjang] reign begins.Wiki: Korean Monarchs
    520Piedras Negras Ruler C and La Amelia king Yuknoom Ch'een1 reigns end and La Amelia Tuun K'ab' Hix reign begins.Wiki: Maya rulersTuun K'ab' Hix's daughter married a lord from La Corona. AKA Cu Ix, Ku Ix, K'altuun Hix, Bound-Stone Jaguar
    521Geumgwan 지왕 (鉗知王) [King Gyeomji] reign ends and 구형왕 (仇衡王) [King Guhyeong] reign begins.Wiki: Korean Monarchs
    6Aug523Pope St Hormisdas papacy ends and Pope St John1 (IOANNES) (Roman) papacy begins 7 days later.Wiki: List of Popes
    523Baekje 무령왕 (武寧王) [King Muryeong] reign ends and 성왕 (聖王) [King Seong] reign begins.Wiki: Korean Monarchs
    29Nov524Palenque king Ahkal Mo' Nahb1 reign ends, beginning the Palenque Interregnum, and Copán king Bahlam Nehn reign ends.Wiki: Maya rulersor 544
    18May526Pope St John1 papacy ends and Pope St Felix4 (FELIX Quartus) (Roman) papacy begins 55 days later.Wiki: List of PopesSometimes called Felix3. Built Santi Cosma e Damiano.
    526Yaxchilan king K'inich Tatb'u Jol2 reign begins.Wiki: Maya rulersK'inich Tatb'u Jol2 's Monuments: Temple 12, Lintel 35
    527Justinian1 the Great's rule over Byzantine Empire begins.(2019) YT: FOL - ByzantinesEmpire population 20 million. He's known as the first actual Byzantine emperor.
    1Apr527Roman emperor Justinian1 (Flavius Petrus Sabbatius Iustinianus) reign begins, and Justin1 reign ends 4 months later.Wiki: List of Roman emperorsNephew of Justin1
    527Tikal king Kaloomte' Bahlam reign ends and Yo K'in reign ends.Wiki: Maya rulers
    528孝明皇帝 [Emperor Xiaoming] of N. Wei reign ends and 孝莊皇帝 [Emperor Xiaozhuang] and 元釗 [Yuan Zhao] of N. Wei reigns begin.Wiki: Chinese monarchs
    6Feb529Palenque kingK'an Joy Chitam1 reign begins, ending the Palenque Interregnum.Wiki: Maya rulersK'an Joy Chitam1 AKA Hok, Kan Xul1, K'an Hok' Chitam
    22Sep530Pope St Felix4 papacy ends and Pope Boniface2 (BONIFACIVS Secundus) (German) papacy begins.Wiki: List of PopesOstrogoth; first Germanic pope. Changed the numbering of the years in the Julian Calendar from Ab Urbe Condita to Anno Domini.
    22Sep530Antipope Dioscore (DIOSCORVS) (Greek) papacy begins.Wiki: List of PopesIn opposition to Pope Boniface2. Candidate of the Byzantine party, elected by the majority of the cardinals and recognized by Constantinople, he uninstalled less than a month after his election.
    14Oct530Antipope Dioscore papacy ends.Wiki: List of Popes
    530孝莊皇帝 [Emperor Xiaozhuang] of N. Wei reign ends and 元曄 [Yuan Ye] of N. Wei reign begins.Wiki: Chinese monarchs
    531Japanese 継体天皇 [Emperor Keitai] reign ends and 安閑天皇 [Emperor Ankan] reign begins.Wiki: Emperors of Japan
    531元曄 [Yuan Ye] of N. Wei reign ends and 節閔皇帝 [Emperor Jiemin] of N. Wei and 元朗 [Yuan Lang] of N. Wei reigns begin.Wiki: Chinese monarchs
    531Caracol king K'an1 reign begins.Wiki: Maya rulers
    531Goguryeo 안장왕 (安藏王) [King Anjang] reign ends and 안원왕 (安原王) [King Anwon] reign begins.Wiki: Korean Monarchs
    17Oct532Pope Boniface2 papacy ends and Pope John2 (IOANNES Secundus) (Roman) papacy begins 77 days later.Wiki: List of PopesFirst pope not to use his personal name, as it was associated with a Roman god, Mercury.
    532節閔皇帝 [Emperor Jiemin] of N. Wei and 元朗 [Yuan Lang] of N. Wei reigns end, and 孝武皇帝 [Emperor Xiaowu] of N. Wei reign begins.Wiki: Chinese monarchs
    532Copán king Wil Ohl K'inich reign begins.Wiki: Maya rulersIf Bahlam Nehn ruled until 544, Wil Ohl K'inich was a co-ruler until the former's uninstall. AKA Head on Earth, Ruler 8
    532Geumgwan 구형왕 (仇衡王) [King Guhyeong] Ends Geumgwan Gaya (one of the Gaya confederacy)Wiki: Korean Monarchs
    533Tamna 서왕 (瑞王) [King Seo] reign ends and 다명왕 (多鳴王) [King Damyeong] reign begins.Wiki: Korean Monarchs
    534孝靜皇帝 [Emperor Xiaojing] of N. Wei reign begins the 東魏 (Eastern Wei) period.Wiki: Chinese monarchs
    8May535Pope John2 papacy ends and Pope St Agapetus1 (AGAPETVS) (Roman) papacy begins 5 days later.Wiki: List of PopesFeast days 22 April and 20 September. Also revered as a saint in Eastern Christianity, with a feast day of 17 April.
    534Caracol king K'an1 reign ends and Tamarindito king Wakoh K'inich reign begins.Wiki: Maya rulers
    535Japanese 安閑天皇 [Emperor Ankan] reign ends and 宣化天皇 [Emperor Senka] reign begins.Wiki: Emperors of Japan
    535文皇帝 [Emperor Wen] reign begins the 西魏 [Western Wei] dynasty, and 孝武皇帝 [Emperor Xiaowu] reign begins the 北魏 [Northern Wei] dynasty.Wiki: Chinese monarchs
    535Yang Zhihui reign begins.Wiki: Chinese monarchs
    22Apr536Pope St Agapetus1 papacy ends and Pope St Silverius (SILVERIVS) (Roman) papacy begins 47 days later.Wiki: List of PopesExiled; feast day 20 June, son of Hormisdas.
    536A giant volcanic eruption triggered a worldwide "volcanic winter".(2021) YT: hochelaga - Biblical ApocIt was believed to be from Indonesia. From Procopius: "During this year a most dreaded portent took place. For the sun gave forth its light without brightness . and it seemed exceedingly like the sun in eclipse, for the beams it shed were not clear."
    11Mar537Pope St Silverius papacy ends and Pope Vigilius (VIGILIVS) (Roman) papacy begins 18 days later.Wiki: List of PopesPope during the Second Council of Constantinople (553), the fifth ecumenical council recognized by the Catholic and Eastern Orthodox temples.
    27Dec537Yaxchilan king K'inich Tatb'u Jol2 reign ends, and Tikal king Wak Chan K'awiil reign begins.Wiki: Maya rulersWak Chan K'awiil AKA Double Bird
    539Japanese 宣化天皇 [Emperor Senka] reign ends and 欽明天皇 [Emperor Kinmei] reign begins.Wiki: Emperors of JapanAll Emperors from Kinmei onwards are historically verifiable;
    539Kofun period ends and Asuka period begins.Wiki: Emperors of Japan
    540Silla 법흥왕 (法興王) [King Beopheung] reign ends and 진흥왕 (眞興王) [King Jinheung] reign begins.Wiki: Korean Monarchs
    545Yang Zhihui reign ends and Yang Bixie reign begins.Wiki: Chinese monarchsYang Zhihui and Yang Bixie could be the same person.
    545Goguryeo 안원왕 (安原王) [King Anwon] reign ends and 양원왕 (陽原王) [King Yangwon] reign begins.Wiki: Korean Monarchs
    5May546La Amelia king Tuun K'ab' Hix reign ends, and Naranjo king Aj Wosal Chan K'inich reign begins.Wiki: Maya rulersAj Wosal Chan K'inich AKA Double Comb
    549武皇帝 [Emperor Wu] of Liang reign ends and 簡文皇帝 [Emperor Jianwen] of Liang reign begins.Wiki: Chinese monarchs
    550孝靜皇帝 [Emperor Xiaojing] of N. Wei reign ends the 東魏 (Eastern Wei), and 文宣皇帝 [Emperor Wenxuan] of N. Wei reign begins the 北齊 [Northern Qi] dynasty.Wiki: Chinese monarchs
    551簡文皇帝 [Emperor Jianwen] of Liang reign ends and 文皇帝 [Emperor Wen] of N. Wei reign ends, and Xiao Dong reign begins.Wiki: Chinese monarchs
    551Wil Ohl K'inich reign ends, and Copán king Sak-Lu reign begins.Wiki: Maya rulersSak-Lu AKA Ruler 9
    552Xiao Dong reign ends and 孝元皇帝 [Emperor Xiaoyuan] of Liang and 元欽 [Yuan Qin] of N. Wei reigns begin.Wiki: Chinese monarchs
    553Yang Bixie reign ends.Wiki: Chinese monarchs
    May553Copán king Sak-Lu reign ends and king Tzi-Bahlam and king Yajaw Te' K'inich2 [Lord Water] (Caracol) reigns begin.Wiki: Maya rulersTzi-Bahlam AKA Moon Jaguar, Ruler 10
    554N. Wei Emperor 元欽 [Yuan Qin] reign ends and 恭皇帝 [Emperor Gong] reign begins.Wiki: Chinese monarchs
    554Tamarindito king Wakoh K'inich reign ends.Wiki: Maya rulers
    554Baekje 성왕 (聖王) [King Seong] reign ends and 위덕왕 (威德王) [King Wideok] reign begins.Wiki: Korean Monarchs
    555孝元皇帝 [Emperor Xiaoyuan] of Liang reign ends.Wiki: Chinese monarchs
    7Jun555Pope Vigilius papacy ends and Pope Pelagius1 (PELAGIVS) (Roman) papacy begins 314 days later.Wiki: List of PopesCredited with the construction of the basilica of Santi Apostoli.
    557恭皇帝 [Emperor Gong] of N. Wei reign ends and (孝)明皇帝 [Emperor (Xiao)Ming] and 孝閔皇帝 [Emperor Xiaomin] of N. Wei reigns begin, the 西魏 [Western Wei] ends and 北周 [Northern Zhou] begins, and 敬皇帝 [Emperor Jing] of Liang reign ends the 梁朝 [Liang dynasty] and 武皇帝 [Emperor Wu] of Chen reign begins the 陳朝 [Chen dynasty]Wiki: Chinese monarchs
    558Tamna 다명왕 (多鳴王) [King Damyeong] reign ends and 담왕 (談王) [King Dam2] reign begins.Wiki: Korean Monarchs
    559Chen 武皇帝 [Emperor Wu] reign ends and 文皇帝 [Emperor Wen] reign begins, and N. Wei 文宣皇帝 [Emperor Wenxuan] reign ends and Emperor 高殷 [Gao Yin] reign begins.Wiki: Chinese monarchs
    559Goguryeo 양원왕 (陽原王) [King Yangwon] reign ends and 평원왕 (平原王) [King Pyeongwon] reign begins.Wiki: Korean Monarchs
    560Emperor 高殷 [Gao Yin] of N. Wei reign ends and (孝)明皇帝 [Emperor (Xiao)Ming] of N. Wei reign ends and 孝昭皇帝 [Emperor Xiaozhao] of N. Wei reign begins.Wiki: Chinese monarchs
    560Yaxchilan king Joy Bahlam2 eign begins.Wiki: Maya rulersJoy Bahlam2 AKA Knot-eye Jaguar 2
    4Mar561Pope Pelagius1 papacy ends and Pope John3 (IOANNES Tertius) (Roman) papacy begins 135 days later.Wiki: List of PopesSecond Pope not to use his personal name.
    561武皇帝 [Emperor Wu] of N. Wei and 武成皇帝 [Emperor Wucheng] of N. Wei reigns begin and 孝昭皇帝 [Emperor Xiaozhao] of N. Wei reign ends.Wiki: Chinese monarchs
    561La Amelia king Sky Witness reign begins.Wiki: Maya rulersSky Witness, made war with Tikal and won over that city, causing the collapse of the extensive power that Tikal had. Before 561
    562宣皇帝 [Emperor Xuan] of W. Liang reign ends and 孝明皇帝 [Emperor (Xiao)Ming] of W. Liang reign begins.Wiki: Chinese monarchs
    562Tikal king Wak Chan K'awiil reign ends and K'inich Waaw reign begins.Wiki: Maya rulersor 593. AKA Animal Skull, Lizard Head, Ete2
    562Daegaya 월광태자 (月光太子) [Prince Wolgwang] Ends the Daegaya of the Gaya confederacy.Wiki: Korean Monarchs
    564Sak tz'i king U K'ab' reign occurs.Wiki: Maya rulers
    565Justinian1 rule over Byzantine Empire ends.(2019) YT: FOL - ByzantinesLast Roman emperor. Byzantine empire moves from Latin to Greece for spoken language.

    569Pusilha king K’awiil Chan K’inich reign begins.Wiki: Maya rulersK’awiil Chan K’inich, this first ruler and dynasty probably descended from the first dynasty of Naranjo
    21Jul570Palenque king Ahkal Mo' Nahb2 reign ends and Yaxchilan king Joy Bahlam2 reign ends.Wiki: Maya rulers
    571Japanese 欽明天皇 [Emperor Kinmei] reign ends.Wiki: Emperors of Japan
    572Japanese 敏達天皇 [Emperor Bidatsu] reign begins.Wiki: Emperors of Japan

    13Jul574Pope John3 papacy ends and Pope Benedict1 (BENEDICTVS) (Roman) papacy begins 324 days later.Wiki: List of Popes
    576Silla 진흥왕 (眞興王) [King Jinheung] reign ends and 진지왕 (眞智王) [King Jinji] reign begins.Wiki: Korean Monarchs
    577Emperor 高緯 [Gao Wei] of N. Qi reign ends, 高恆 [Gao Heng] of N. Qi reign occurs, and 高紹義 [Gao Shaoyi] of N. Qi reign begins.Wiki: Chinese monarchs
    5Oct578Roman emperor Justin2 (Iustinus) reign ends and Tiberius2 Constantine (Tiberius Constantinus) reign begins.Wiki: List of Roman emperorsTiberius2 was adopted son of Justin2, and regent from 574. Justin2 uninstalled by natural causes, after insanity.
    578武皇帝 [Emperor Wu] of N. Wei reign ends and 宣皇帝 [Emperor Xuan] of N. Wei reign begins.Wiki: Chinese monarchs
    22Oct578Copán king Tzi-Bahlam reign ends and king K'ak' Chan Yopaat reign begins 24 days later.Wiki: Maya rulersK'ak' Chan Yopaat AKA Butz' Chan, Smoke Serpent
    30Jul579Pope Benedict1 papacy ends and Pope Pelagius2 (PELAGIVS Secundus) (Romanized Ostrogoth) papacy begins 119 days later.Wiki: List of PopesOrdered the construction of the Basilica di San Lorenzo fuori le Mura.
    579Emperor 高紹義 [Gao Shaoyi] of N. Qi reign ends the 北齊 [Northern Qi] dynasty, and 宣皇帝 [Emperor Xuan] of N. Zhou reign ends and 靜皇帝 [Emperor Jing] of N. Zhou reign begins Wiki: Chinese monarchs
    2Sep579La Amelia king Yax Yopaat reign ends and Uneh Chan reign begins.Wiki: Maya rulersUneh Chan AKA Scroll Serpent
    579Silla 진지왕 (眞智王) [King Jinji] reign ends and 진평왕 (眞平王) [King Jinpyeong] reign begins.Wiki: Korean Monarchs
    581文皇帝 [Emperor Wen] of Sui reign begins the 隋朝 [Sui dynasty], and 靜皇帝 [Emperor Jing] of 北周 [Northern Zhou]reign ends the 北朝 [northern dynasties] period.Wiki: Chinese monarchs
    14Aug582Roman emperor Tiberius2 Constantine reign ends and Maurice (Mauricius Tiberius) reign begins.Wiki: List of Roman emperorsMaurice was son-in-law of Tiberius2
    582孝宣皇帝 [Emperor Xiaoxuan] of Liu Song reign ends.Wiki: Chinese monarchs
    583Chen Shubao reign begins.Wiki: Chinese monarchsChen Shubao
    1Feb583Palenque king Kan Bahlam1 reign ends and king Yohl Ik'nal reign begins 323 days later.Wiki: Maya rulersYohl Ik'nal AKA Lady Kan Ik, Lady K'anal Ik'nal
    583Tamna 담왕 (談王) [King Dam2] reign ends and 체삼왕 (體參王) [King Cheseam] reign begins.Wiki: Korean Monarchs
    585Japanese 敏達天皇 [Emperor Bidatsu] reign ends and 用明天皇 [Emperor Yōmei] reign begins.Wiki: Emperors of Japan
    585W. Liang 孝明皇帝 [Emperor Xiaoming] reign ends and 孝靖皇帝 [Emperor Xiaojing] reign begins.Wiki: Chinese monarchs
    587Japanese 用明天皇 [Emperor Yōmei] reign ends and 崇峻天皇 [Emperor Sushun] reign begins.Wiki: Emperors of Japan
    587孝靖皇帝 [Emperor Xiaojing] reign ends the 西梁 [Western Liang] dynasty.Wiki: Chinese monarchs
    589Chen Shubao reign ends the 陳朝 [Chen dynasty], the 南朝 (southern dynasties) period, and the 南北朝 [Northern and Southern Dynasties] era.Wiki: Chinese monarchs
    590Roman emperor Theodosius reign begins.Wiki: List of Roman emperorsSon of Maurice
    7Feb590Pope Pelagius2 papacy ends and Pope St Gregory1 the Great (GREGORIVS MAGNVS) (Roman) papacy begins 208 days later.Wiki: List of PopesLast imperial Roman Pope. Great2-grandson of pope Felix3. The first formally to employ the titles Servus servorum Dei and Pontifex Maximus. Established the Gregorian chant. Feast day 3 September. Also revered as a saint in Eastern Christianity, with a feast day of 12 March. Known as "the Father of Christian Worship". Known as "St Gregory the Dialogist" in Eastern Orthodoxy.
    590Goguryeo 평원왕 (平原王) [King Pyeongwon] reign ends and 영양왕 (嬰陽王) [King Yeongyang] reign begins.Wiki: Korean Monarchs
    592Japanese 崇峻天皇 [Emperor Sushun] reign ends and 推古天皇 [Empress Suiko] eign begins.Wiki: Emperors of Japanfirst non-legendary female Emperor; Prince Shotoku acted as her regent
    593Prince Shotoku brings Buddism over from Baekje on the Korean peninsula.(2016) YT: BW - history of japan

    600Baekje 법왕 (法王) [King Beop] reign ends and 무왕 (武王) [King Mu] reign begins.Wiki: Korean Monarchs
    600sKingdom of Srivijaya begins around Sumatra.(2019) YT: EH - MajapahitThey controlled access to the sea in exchange for rice, but left islands to govern themselves, including their own. Mataram gained control of Sumatra, much more conservative than the Srivijayan. Centuries before, the Javanese started using wet rice production to increase yields, and through rainwater collection and resovoir control, Mataram controlled who could grow food on the island, giving them a large work force.
    600sTenochtitlan decline continues until sudden collapse(2018) YT: OSP - Quetzalcoatl

    8Aug612Palenque king Ajen Yohl Mat reign ends and king Janahb Pakal reign occurs and king Sak K'uk' reign begins 73 days later.Wiki: Maya rulersJanahb Pakal AKA Janaab Pakal, Pakal1. Position uncertain. Sak K'uk' AKA 6 Cimi Pakal
    613Caracol king Knot Ajaw reign ends, and Tamarindito Ruler 4 reign ends and Wakoh Chan K'inich reign begins.Wiki: Maya rulers
    Early 600sSome of Goguryeo's own records of individual kings, especially Gwanggaeto, use the titles Taewang [Greatest King] or Hotaewang [Very Greatest King].Wiki: Korean PMsSome argue that the title should be translated as equivalent of the Chinese title 皇帝 [emperor]. The king names generally derive from the location of the king's burial, and do not necessarily correspond to the Chinese concept of 諡號. Goguryeos had the surname Go, except for the second (Yuri) through fifth (Mobon), whose surnames are recorded as Hae. All of the kings are recorded to belong to the same patrilineal bloodline. It is not clear whether the two surnames are different transcription of the same name, or evidence of a power struggle. The Jolbon line names and dates are from the Samguk Sagi. The Wei shu (History of the Wei dynasty) gives the following names: 朱蒙 Jumong, 閭達 Yeodal, 始閭諧 Shiryeohae, 如栗 Yeoyul, and 莫來 Mangnae. The legendary line had already been formed with some variants in the early 5th century when king Jangsu built a monument for his father and Goguryeo made contact with the Northern Wei. The inscription of that monument gives these names: 鄒牟 Chumo, 儒留 Yuryu, and 大朱留 Daejuryu. The connections between those names are not clear.
    8May615Pope St Boniface4 papacy ends and Pope St Adeodatus1 (ADEODATVS or DEVSDEDIT) (Roman) papacy begins 189 days later.Wiki: List of PopesSometimes called Deusdedit. The first pope to use lead seals on papal documents, which in time came to be called papal bulls.
    27Jul615Naranjo king Aj Wosal Chan K'inich reign ends and, Palenque king Sak K'uk' reign ends and K'inich Janaab' Pakal1 the Great reign begins.Wiki: Maya rulersK'inich Janaab' Pakal1 was responsible for the construction or extension of some of Palenque's most notable surviving inscriptions and monumental architecture. AKA Pacal, 8 Ahau, Sun Shield
    617煬皇帝 [Emperor Yang] of Sui reign ends and 恭皇帝 [Emperor Gong1] of Sui reign begins.Wiki: Chinese monarchsdeclared emperor by Li Yuan (the later Tang Emperor Gaozu), implying a retirement for Emperor Yang (whom he "honoured" as Taishang Huang [retired emperor]) at the western capital Daxing (Chang'an), but only the commanderies under Li's control recognized this change; for the other commanderies under Sui control, Emperor Yang was still regarded as emperor, not as retired emperor. Now generally regarded as a legitimate emperor, due to his recognition by Li Yuan.
    8Nov618Pope St Adeodatus1 papacy ends and Pope Boniface5 (BONIFACIVS Quintus) (Roman) papacy begins 410 days later.Wiki: List of Popes
    618 恭皇帝 [Emperor Gong1] of Sui reign ends and 恭皇帝 [Emperor Gong2] of Sui reign begins, and Tang emperor 高祖 [Gaozu] reign begins the 唐朝 [Tang dynasty], and Yang Hao reign begins.Wiki: Chinese monarchsAfter news of Emperor Yang's uninstall in 618 reached Daxing and the eastern capital Luoyang, Li Yuan deposed Emperor Gong1 and took the throne himself, establishing Tang dynasty, but the Sui officials at Luoyang declared Emperor Gong1's brother Yang Tong (later also known as Emperor Gong2) emperor. The legitimacy of his reign is disputed.
    618Caracol king K'an2 reign begins.Wiki: Maya rulers

    8Feb628Tikal king K'inich Waaw reign ends and K'inich Muwaan Jol2 reign occurs and K'inich Wayaan? reign begins, and Copán king K'ak' Chan Yopaat reign ends and Chan Imix K'awiil reign begins.Wiki: Maya rulersK'inich Wayaan?, probably identifiable with 23rd Ruler - 635 if he is the 23rd Ruler, K'inich Muwaan Jol2, probably identifiable with 24th Ruler - 645 if he is the 24th Ruler. Chan Imix K'awiil was probably the longest-reigning ruler of the city. AKA Smoke Jaguar, Smoke Imix - Monuments: Stelae 1, 2, 3, 5, 6, 10, 12, 13, 19, 23; Altars H', I', K & 5; Burial in Temple 26

    647Silla 선덕여왕 (善德王) [King Seondeok] reign ends and 진덕여왕 (眞德王) [King Jindeok] reign begins.Wiki: Korean Monarchs
    648B'alaj Chan K'awiil founds Dos Pilas, beginning his reign.Wiki: Maya rulersB'alaj Chan K'awiil probably saw himself as the legitimate heir to the Tikal throne. He moved away from the capital to found a new one at Dos Pilas, which grew to become a rival kingdom, under overlordship of Calakmul. AKA Ruler 1, Flint Sky, Flint Sky God K, Lightning Sky, Malah Chan K'awil.

    660Baekje King 부여의자 (扶餘義慈) [Buyeo Uija] reign ends and King 부여풍 (扶餘豊) [Buyeo Pung] reign begins.Wiki: Korean Monarchs
    661Japanese 斉明天皇 [Empress Saimei] reign ends and 天智天皇 [Emperor Tenji] reign begins.Wiki: Emperors of Japan [Katsuragi/Nakano-ooe] (Ame Mikoto Hirakasuwake no Mikoto/Amatsu Mikoto Sakiwake no Mikoto)
    661Silla 태종무열왕 (太宗武烈王) [King Taejong Muyeol] reign ends and 문무왕 (文武王) [King Munmu] reign begins.Wiki: Korean MonarchsUnified Silla
    662Moral Reforma king Muwaan Jol reign begins.Wiki: Maya rulersMuwaan Jol ascended under king Yuknoom of Calakmul; however, in 690, ascended once again under the king of Palenque.
    663Baekje 부여풍 (扶餘豊) [Buyeo Pung] reign end the Baekje kingdomWiki: Korean Monarchs
    665Toniná king K'inich Hix Chapat reign ends.Wiki: Maya rulers
    15Sep668Roman emperor Constans2 reign ends and Constantine4 (Φλάβιος Κωνσταντῖνος Αὔγουστος) reign begins.Wiki: List of Roman emperorsConstantine4 was the odest son of Constans2, co-emperor since 654. Constans2 was possibly uninstalled by his son Romanos2.
    668Toniná Ruler 2 reign begins.Wiki: Maya rulersRuler 2 AKA Jaguar Casper
    668Goguryeo 고보장 (高寶藏) [King Go Bojang] Ends the Goguryeo kingdomWiki: Korean Monarchs
    670Machaquila king Sihyaj K'in Ich'aak1 reign begins, and Pusilha king Muyal Naah K’ukhul K’ahk’ U’ reign ends and Ruler D reign begins.Wiki: Maya rulersSihyaj K'in Ich'aak1 's Monuments: Stela 13, Altar E
    27Jan672Pope St Vitalian papacy ends and Pope Adeodatus2 (ADEODATVS Secundus) (Roman) papacy begins 75 days later.Wiki: List of PopesSometimes called Adeodatus, without a number, in reference to Adeodatus1 sometimes being called Deusdedit.
    672Japanese 天智天皇 [Emperor Tenji] reign ends and 弘文天皇 [Emperor Kōbun] reign begins, then gets usurped by - 天武天皇 [Emperor Tenmu]Wiki: Emperors of Japan
    672El Perú Lady K'abel reign begins.Wiki: Maya rulers
    17Jun676Pope Adeodatus2 papacy ends and Pope Donus (DONVS) (Roman) papacy begins 138 days later.Wiki: List of Popes
    11Apr678Pope Donus papacy ends and Pope St Agatho (AGATHO) (Greek) papacy begins 77 days later.Wiki: List of PopesAlso revered as a saint in Eastern Christianity, with a feast day of 20 February. Pope during the Third Council of Constantinople (680), the sixth ecumenical council accepted by the Catholic and Eastern Orthodox temples.
    679Tikal king Nuun Ujol Chaak reign ends.Wiki: Maya rulers
    680Naranjo king K'ahk' Xiiw Chan Chaahk reign ends, and Caracol king K'ak' Ujol K'inich2 reign ends, and Pusilha Ruler D reign ends and Ruler E reign begins.Wiki: Maya rulers
    681Roman emperor Heraclius (Φλάβιος Ἡράκλειος Αὔγουστος) and Tiberius reign ends and Justinian2 (Φλάβιος Ἰουστινιανὸς Αὔγουστος) reign begins.Wiki: List of Roman emperorsConstantine4 deposed and uninstalled Heraclius by disassembly, then elevated his son Justinian2.
    10Jan681Pope St Agatho papacy ends and Pope St Leo2 (LEO Secundus) (Greek) papacy begins 584 days later.Wiki: List of PopesFeast day 3 July.
    23Oct681Yaxchilan king Yaxun Bahlam3 reign ends and It zamnaaj Bahlam3 reign begins.Wiki: Maya rulersIt zamnaaj Bahlam3 AKA Shield Jaguar3
    681Silla 문무왕 (文武王) [King Munmu] reign ends and 신문왕 (神文王) [King Sinmun] reign begins.Wiki: Korean Monarchs
    3May682Tikal king Jasaw Chan K'awiil1 reign begins.Wiki: Maya rulersJasaw Chan K'awiil1's defeat of the rival Maya city of Calakmul in 695 is seen to represent a resurgence in the strength and influence of Tikal. AKA Ruler A, Ah Cacao, Sky Rain - Monuments: Tikal Temple1, Lintels 2 and 3 of Temple 1
    3Jul683Pope St Leo2 papacy ends and Pope St Benedict2 (BENEDICTVS Secundus) (Roman) papacy begins 359 days later.Wiki: List of PopesFeast day 7 May.
    683Tang emperor 高宗 [Gaozong] reign ends.Wiki: Chinese monarchs
    26Aug683Palenque king K'inich Janaab' Pakal1 the Great reign ends.Wiki: Maya rulers
    683Tamna 처량왕 (處良王) [King Cheoryang] reign ends and 원왕 (遠王) [King Won] reign begins.Wiki: Korean Monarchs
    684Tang Emperor 中宗 [Zhongzong] reign begins 睿宗 [Ruizong] reign begins.Wiki: Chinese monarchs
    Jan684Palenque king K'inich Kan Bahlam2 reign begins.Wiki: Maya rulersK'inich Kan Bahlam2 continued the ambitious project of adorning Palenque with fine art and architecture begun by his father. AKA Chan Bahlum2
    14Sep685Roman emperor Constantine4 reign ends.Wiki: List of Roman emperorsConstantine4 was uninstalled by Oregon Trail.
    8May685Pope St Benedict2 papacy ends and Pope John5 (IOANNES Quintus) (Greek) papacy begins 76 days later.Wiki: List of Popes
    2Aug686Pope John5 papacy ends and Pope Conon (CONON) (Greek) papacy begins 80 days later.Wiki: List of Popes
    686Japanese 天武天皇 [Emperor Tenmu] reign ends and 持統天皇 [Empress Jitō] reign begins.Wiki: Emperors of Japan
    15Nov686Piedras Negras king It zam K'an Ahk1 reign ends and La Amelia king Yuknoom Ch'een2 the Great reign ends.Wiki: Maya rulers
    21Sep687Pope Conon papacy ends and Pope St Sergius1 (SERGIVS) (Hellenized Syrian) papacy begins 85 days later.Wiki: List of PopesIntroduced the singing of the Lamb of God at mass.
    2Jan687Toniná Ruler 2 reign ends and Piedras Negras king K'inich Yo'nal Ahk2 reign begins.Wiki: Maya rulersK'inich Yo'nal Ahk2 AKA Ruler 3
    688Toniná king K'inich B'aaknal Chaak reign begins.Wiki: Maya rulersK'inich B'aaknal Chaak AKA Ruler 3; Personage 3; Kuk; Craneo de Serpiente (Snake Skull)
    690Tang emperor 睿宗 [Ruizong] reign ends, and 武周 [Wu Zhou] & Empress Regnant Tiance Jinlun Shengshen reigns begin the Tang Interregnum.Wiki: Chinese monarchs
    690Moral Reforma king Muwaan Jol reign ends.Wiki: Maya rulersafter 690
    692Dos Pilas king B'alaj Chan K'awiil and El Perú Lady K'abel reigns end.Wiki: Maya rulers
    692Silla 신문왕 (神文王) [King Sinmun] reign ends and 효소왕 (孝昭王) [King Hyoso] reign begins.Wiki: Korean Monarchs
    31May693Naranjo king Sak tz'i king K'ab Chan Te'2? reign ends and K'ak' Tiliw Chan Chaak reign begins.Wiki: Maya rulers
    • K'ak' Tiliw Chan Chaak's father (B'alaj Chan K'awiil) was probably a cousin of K'ahk' Xiiw Chan Chaahk. She used the Tikal emblem to prove her lineage from the Tikal royal line, through B'alaj Chan K'awiil. Under regency of Lady Wak Chanil of Dos Pilas until 26 March 706.
    • Shortly after his accesson, Naranjo fought and won a series of victories against polities, some of whom may have been rebelling against K'ak' Tiliw's mother. It's possible that was his mother the organizer of many of Naranjo campaigns that, early in his reign, defeated Yaxha, Tikal, and Ucanal. AKA Smoking Squirrel - Monuments: Stelae 1, 2, 3, 21, 22, 23, 24, 26, 28, 29, 30 and 31
    695Roman emperor Justinian2 reign ends and Leontios (Λεόντιος Αὔγουστος) reign begins.Wiki: List of Roman emperorsLeontios led the army in revolt against Justinian2.
    15Jun695La Amelia king Split Earth reign occurs, and Dos Pilas king It zamnaaj B'alam reign occurs, and Copán king Chan Imix K'awiil reign ends and Uaxaclajuun Ub'aah K'awiil reign begins.Wiki: Maya rulersSplit Earth, probably a co-ruler. Little is known about It zamnaaj B'alam. He probably had a short reign. AKA Shield Jaguar If Uaxaclajuun Ub'aah K'awiil ascended on 2 January, he briefly co-ruled with his predecessor. K'awii was captured and beheaded by the ruler of Quirigua. AKA Oxwitik, 18 Rabbit - Monuments: Stelae A, B, C, D, E, F, G, H, J & 4; Altar S; Lower Hieroglyphic Stairway of Temple 26; Step of Temple 22; Ballcourt A2b markers; Ballcourt A-3 text & markers
    697Japanese 持統天皇 [Empress Jitō] reign ends and 文武天皇 [Emperor Monmu] reign begins.Wiki: Emperors of Japan
    698Roman emperor Leontios reign ends and Tiberios3 Apsimaros (Τιβέριος Αὔγουστος) reign begins.Wiki: List of Roman emperorsTiberios3 led the army in revolt against Leontios.
    24Mar698Dos Pilas king It zamnaaj K'awiil and Ucanal king It zamnaaj Bahlam reigns begin.Wiki: Maya rulersIt zamnaaj K'awiil AKA Ruler 2, Shield God K
    698Balhae 고왕 (高王) [King Go] begins the Balhae Kingdom after the fall of Goguryeo. Wiki: Korean MonarchsBalhae occupied southern parts of Northeast China, Primorsky Krai, and the northern part of the Korean peninsula.
    700sNasrid Kingdom of Granada begins.Wiki: Expulsion Jews Spain
    700Aguateca king Ucha'an K'an B'alam reign occurs, and Caracol king Unknown1 and Ruler7 reigns occur, and Seibal king Pat-K'awiil reign ends, and and Motul de San José king Sak Muwaan reign begins.Wiki: Maya rulersUcha'an K'an B'alam, father of Tan Te' Kinich. Reigns are vague during the 700s
    700Teotihuacan conquered by northern micropowers.SFGate - Olmecs to ToltecsIts widespread influence rapidly diminished.
    700Bow and arrow introduced to Mississippi plains Native micropowers.(2022) YT: AA - CahokiaClustering of villages required more farming. (Introduced from "The West" - Who specifically brought it here?)
    8Sep701Pope St Sergius1 papacy ends and Pope John6 (IOANNES Sextus) (Ioannes) (Greek) papacy begins 52 days later.Wiki: List of PopesThe only pope who came from Asia Minor.
    701Motul de San José king Yichte K'inich1 reign begins.Wiki: Maya rulers
    1Feb702Palenque king K'inich Kan Bahlam2 reign ends and K'inich K'an Joy Chitam2 reign begins 116 days later, and Tamarindito king Aj Ihk' Wolok and Ucanal king It zamnaaj Bahlam reigns end, and La Amelia king Yuknoom Took' K'awiil reign begins.Wiki: Maya rulersYuknoom Took' K'awiil's daughter married a lord from La Corona. AKA Ruler 5/6/7 - Monuments: Stelae 1, 7?, 8, 23, 24, 38, 39?, 40, 41?, 42?, 51, 52, 53, 54, 55, 70, 71, 72, 73, 74 and 8. K'inich K'an Joy Chitam2 was captured by Toniná in 711, but possibly restored to kingship. AKA Kan Xul2, K'an Hok' Chitam On2
    702Silla 효소왕 (孝昭王) [King Hyoso] reign ends and 성덕왕 (聖德王) [King Seongdeok] reign begins.Wiki: Korean Monarchs
    11Jan705Pope John6 papacy ends and Pope John7 (IOANNES Septimus) (Ioannes) (Greek) papacy begins 49 days later.Wiki: List of PopesThe second pope to bear the same name as his immediate predecessor.
    Aug705Roman emperor Tiberios3 Apsimaros reign ends and Justinian2 (Φλάβιος Ἰουστινιανὸς Αὔγουστος) second) reign with Tiberius (Τιβέριος Αὔγουστος) reigns beginWiki: List of Roman emperorsJustinian2 returned on the throne with Bulgar support, naming his son Tiberius as co-emperor in 706.
    705武周 [Wu Zhou] & Empress Regnant Tiance Jinlun Shengshen reigns end the Tang Interregnum, and Tang emperor 中宗 [Zhongzong] reign begins.Wiki: Chinese monarchs
    18Oct707Pope John7 papacy ends and Pope Sisinnius (SISINNIVS) (Sisinnius) (Syrian) papacy begins 89 days later.Wiki: List of Popes
    707Japanese 文武天皇 [Emperor Monmu] reign ends and 元明天皇 [Empress Genmei] reign begins.Wiki: Emperors of Japan
    4Feb708Pope Sisinnius papacy ends and Pope Constantine (CONSTANTINVS) (Constantinus) (Syrian) papacy begins 50 days later.Wiki: List of PopesLast pope to visit Greece while in office, until John Paul2 in 2001.
    708Toniná Ruler 4 reign begins.Wiki: Maya rulersRuler 4 AKA Dios Jaguar (Jaguar God)
    708Tamna 원왕 (遠王) [King Won] reign ends and 표륜왕 (表倫王) [King Pyoryun] reign begins.Wiki: Korean Monarchs
    710Asuka period ends and Nara period begins.Wiki: Emperors of Japan
    710Tang Emperor 中宗 [Zhongzong] reign ends and 睿宗 [Ruizong] and Shang reigns begin.Wiki: Chinese monarchs
    710Pusilha king Ruler E reign ends and Lady Ich’aak K’inich reign begins, and Machaquila king Sihyaj K'in Ich'aak1 and Motul de San José king Yichte K'inich1 reigns end.Wiki: Maya rulers
    711Kojiki - Records of Ancient Matters published in Japan, using Chinese characters.(2016) YT: BW - history of japanThis is when Japan started writing Japanese language with Chinese letters.
    Dec711Roman emperor Justinian2 (Φλάβιος Ἰουστινιανὸς Αὔγουστος) second reign with Tiberius reign ends and Philippikos Bardanes (Φιλιππικὸς Αὔγουστος) reign begins.Wiki: List of Roman emperorsPhilippikos Bardanes led a the army in revolt, uninstalling both.
    711Tamarindito Ruler 9 reign ends and Machaquila king Ets'nab-Chaak reign begins.Wiki: Maya rulersAt the end of his reign, Machaquilá's suzerain kingdom, Dos Pilas, was abandoned and, during the political turmoil that followed, Cancuén stole power from Machaquilá.
    712Tang emperor 睿宗 [Ruizong] reign ends and 玄宗 [Xuanzong] reign begins.Wiki: Chinese monarchs
    712Tamarindito Ruler 10 reign ends and king Chak Bin Ahk reign begins.Wiki: Maya rulers
    3Jun713Roman emperor Philippikos Bardanes reign ends and Anastasios2 (Αρτέμιος Ἀναστάσιος Αὔγουστος) reign begins.Wiki: List of Roman emperorsBureaucrat and secretary under Philippikos, Anastasios2 was raised to the purple by the soldiers
    9Apr715Pope Constantine papacy ends and Pope St Gregory2 (GREGORIVS Secundus) (Gregorius) (Roman) papacy begins 40 days later.Wiki: List of PopesFeast day 11 February. Held the Synod of Rome (721).
    May715Roman emperor Theodosius3 (Θεοδόσιος Αὔγουστος) reign begins, and Anastasios2 reign ends in NovemberWiki: List of Roman emperorsTroops chose Theodosius3 over Anastasios2.
    715Japanese 元明天皇 [Empress Genmei] reign ends and 元正天皇 [Empress Genshō] reign begins.Wiki: Emperors of Japan
    715Toniná king K'inich B'aaknal Chaak reign ends.Wiki: Maya rulers
    25Mar717Roman emperor Theodosius3 reign ends and Leo3 the Isaurian (Λέων) reign begins.Wiki: List of Roman emperorsLeo3 led a rebellion, causing Theodosius3 to become a monk.
    719Balhae 고왕 (高王) [King Go] reign ends and 무왕 (武王) [King Mu] reign begins.Wiki: Korean Monarchs
    720Nihon Shoki [Early Japan] published in Japan, full of poetry.(2016) YT: BW - history of japan
    720Naranjo king K'ak' Tiliw Chan Chaak reign ends.Wiki: Maya rulers
    11Oct721Naranjo queen Wak Chanil of Dos Pilas reign begins, and Palanque king K'inich K'an Joy Chitam2 reign ends and king K'inich Ahkal Mo' Nahb3 reign begins 80 days later.Wiki: Maya rulersK'inich Ahkal Mo' Nahb3 was grandson of K'inich Janaab Pakal1. His construction program rivaled that of his predecessors, and contributed enormously to the surviving records of Palenque history. AKA Chaacal3, Akul Anab3. Wak Chanil of Dos Pilas was mother of her predecessor. Previously regent on her son's behalf, from 721 assumed the reins of the kingdom herself as queen regnant. AKA Lady Six Sky - Monuments: Stelae 3, 18, 24, 29, 31
    723Toniná Ruler 4 reign ends and king K'inich Ich'aak Chapat reign begins.Wiki: Maya rulersK'inich Ich'aak Chapat AKA Ruler 5; Garra de Jaguar (Jaguar Claw)
    724Japanese 元正天皇 [Empress Genshō] reign ends and 聖武天皇 [Emperor Shōmu] reign begins.Wiki: Emperors of Japan
    724Quiriguá king K'ak' Tiliw Chan Yopaat reign begins.Wiki: Maya rulersCauac/Kawak Sky
    725Motul de San José king Sak Muwaan reign ends and king Tayel Chan K'inich reign begins.Wiki: Maya rulers
    22Oct726Naranjo king It zamnaaj K'awiil reign ends.Wiki: Maya rulers
    6Jan727Dos Pilas king Ucha'an K'in B'alam reign begins.Wiki: Maya rulersUcha'an K'in B'alam has no apparent family relation to his predecessors, being probably a regent. It is known that, twenty years earlier, he was already a prominent figure in the kingdom (being responsible, for example, for the capture of the lord of Tikal in 705, or involving himself closely in rituals performed by the previous king). As a ruler (regent or usurper) he provided strong leadership. Erected monuments in Dos Pilas and Aguateca. AKA Ruler 3, Master of the Sun Jaguar, Scroll-head God K, Spangle-head, Jewelled-head - Monuments: Stela 5
    729Piedras Negras king K'inich Yo'nal Ahk2 reign ends and It zam K'an Ahk2 reign begins.Wiki: Maya rulersThere is evidence that It zam K'an Ahk2 started a new patriline at Piedras Negras. AKA Ruler 4
    11Feb731Pope St Gregory2 papacy ends and Pope St Gregory3 (GREGORIVS Tertius) (Gregorius) (Syrian) papacy begins 35 days later.Wiki: List of PopesThe last pope from Syria. The third pope to bear the same name as his immediate predecessor. Last pope to have been installed outside Europe until the election of Francis in 2013.
    9Nov731Pusilha Lady Ich’aak K’inich reign ends and king K’ahk Chan reign begins, and Tamarindito king Chak Bin Ahk reign ends and La Amelia king Yuknoom Took' K'awiil reign ends.Wiki: Maya rulersK’ahk Chan began a new line of rulers
    733Tamna 표륜왕 (表倫王) [King Pyoryun] reign ends and 형왕 (逈王) [King Hyeong] reign begins.Wiki: Korean Monarchs
    8Dec734Tikal king king Jasaw Chan K'awiil1 reign ends and Yik'in Chan K'awiil reign begins.Wiki: Maya rulersYik'in Chan K'awiil was one of Tikal's most successful and expansionary rulers, consolidating the political gains won by his father. AKA Ruler B, Yaxkin Caan Chac, Sun Sky Rain - Monuments: Stelae 5, 20 and 21
    735Seibal king Ich'aak Bahlam1 reign ends and king Ich'aak Bahlam2 reign begins, and Motul de San José king Tayel Chan K'inich reign ends.Wiki: Maya rulersIch'aak Bahlam1 and Ich'aak Bahlam2 were both known as Jaguar Claw
    12May736Palenque king K'inich Ahkal Mo' Nahb3 reign ends and Copán king Uaxaclajuun Ub'aah K'awiil reign ends and La Amelia king Wamaw K'awiil reign occurs.Wiki: Maya rulers
    737Silla 성덕왕 (聖德王) [King Seongdeok] reign ends and 효성왕 (孝成王) [King Hyoseong] reign begins, and Balhae 무왕 (武王) [King Mu] reign ends and 문왕 (文王) [King Mun] reign begins.Wiki: Korean Monarchs
    7Jun738Copán king K'ak' Joplaj Chan K'awiil reign begins.Wiki: Maya rulersK'ak' Joplaj Chan K'awiil AKA Smoke Monkey
    739Toniná king K'inich Ich'aak Chapat reign ends.Wiki: Maya rulersAfter 739
    18Jun741Roman emperor Artabasdos (Ἀρτάβασδος) with Nikephoros (Νικηφόρος) and Constantine5 (Κωνσταντῖνος) reigns beginWiki: List of Roman emperorsConstantine5 was son of Leo3, and Artabasdos was son-in-law of Leo3. Artabasdos usurped throne, proclaiming his son Nikephoros as co-emperor.
    18Jun741Roman emperor Leo3 the Isaurian (Λέων) reign ends.Wiki: List of Roman emperorsUninstalled by Edema
    28Nov741Pope St Gregory3 papacy ends and Pope St Zachary (ZACHARIAS) (Zacharias) (Greek) papacy begins 5 days later.Wiki: List of PopesFeast day 15 March. Built the temple of Santa Maria sopra Minerva.
    11Feb741Naranjo king Wak Chanil of Dos Pilas reign ends, La Amelia king Bolon K'awiil1 reign occurs, and Naranjo king Yax Mayuy Chan Chaak reign begins.Wiki: Maya rulersBolon K'awiil1 AKA Ruler Y, Ruler 8. Yax Mayuy Chan Chaak was defeated by Tikal and ceremonially uninstalled.
    9Mar741Pusilha king K'awiil Chan K'inich reign begins.Wiki: Maya rulersK'awiil Chan K'inich AKA Ruler 4, God K Sky Mahk'ina - Monuments: Panel 19.
    28May741Dos Pilas king Ucha'an K'in B'alam reign ends.Wiki: Maya rulers
    15Jun742Yaxchilan king It zamnaaj Bahlam3 reign ends, Palenque king K'inich Janaab Pakal2 reign occurs, and Motul de San José king Yajaw Te' K'inich reign begins.Wiki: Maya rulersK'inich Janaab Pakal2 was probable brother of the predecessor. AKA Upakal K'inich. Yajaw Te' K'inich son of Sak Muwaan.
    742CharleMagne installs.(2020) YT: FOL - CharleMagne
    742CharleMagne (Charles1 the Great) installsWiki: HRE
    742Silla 효성왕 (孝成王) [King Hyoseong] reign ends and 경덕왕 (景德王) [King Gyeongdeok] reign begins.Wiki: Korean Monarchs
    2Nov743Roman emperor Artabasdos (Ἀρτάβασδος) with Nikephoros (Νικηφόρος) reign ends.Wiki: List of Roman emperors
    4Feb744Naranjo king Yax Mayuy Chan Chaak reign ends.Wiki: Maya rulers
    15Aug746Chiapa de Corzo king Joy Bahlam0 reign ends and king Ak-Sak-Teles reign begins, and Naranjo king K'ak' Yipiiy Chan Chaak reign begins.Wiki: Maya rulersK'ak' Yipiiy Chan Chaak 's Monuments: Stela 20
    748Naranjo king K'ak' Yipiiy Chan Chaak reign ends.Wiki: Maya rulers
    749Japanese 聖武天皇 [Emperor Shōmu] reign ends and 孝謙天皇 [Empress Kōken] reign begins.Wiki: Emperors of Japanreigned twice
    18Jan749Yaxchilan king Yopaat Bahlam2 reign occurs, and Copán king K'ak' Joplaj Chan K'awiil reign ends and K'ak' Yipyaj Chan K'awiil (Copán) reign begins 31 days later.Wiki: Maya rulersK'ak' Yipyaj Chan K'awiil AKA Smoke Shell, Smoke Squirrel
    750Seibal king Ich'aak Bahlam2 reign ends, and Pusilha king K’ahk Chan reign ends and K’ahk Kalav reign begins.Wiki: Maya rulers
    751Palanque king K'inich Kan Bahlam3 reign occurs and La Amelia king Great Serpent reign occurs.Wiki: Maya rulersAjaw B'ot AKA Ruler D, Ah-Bolon-Abta. Bolon K'awiil2 AKA Ruler 9. Great Serpent AKA Ruler 8, Ruler Z
    22Mar752Pope St Zachary papacy ends and Antipope Stephen (STEPHANUS) (Stephanus) (Roman) papacy begins.Wiki: List of PopesPreviously known as Stephen2. Uninstalled three days after his election, having never received episcopal consecration. Some lists still include him. The Vatican sanctioned his addition in the sixteenth century; removed in 1961. He is no longer considered a pope by Vatican City.
    25Mar752Antipope Stephen papacy ends and Pope Stephen2 (STEPHANVS Secundus) (Stephanus) (Roman) papacy begins 1 day later.Wiki: List of PopesSometimes called Stephen3. The Donation of Pepin. Brother of Paul1.
    752Yaxchilan king Yaxun Bahlam4 reign begins.Wiki: Maya rulersYaxun Bahlam4 AKA Bird Jaguar4
    754Sak tz'i king Aj Sak Maax reign begins.Wiki: Maya rulers
    8Nov755Naranjo king K'ahk' Ukalaw Chan Chaak reign begins, and Motul de San José king Yajaw Te' K'inich reign ends and Lamaw Ek' reign begins.Wiki: Maya rulersK'ahk' Ukalaw Chan Chaak 's Monuments: Stelae 6, 11, 13, 19, 33, 36
    756Tang Emperor 玄宗 [Xuanzong] reign ends and 肅宗 [Suzong] reign begins.Wiki: Chinese monarchs
    26Apr757Pope Stephen2 papacy ends and Pope St Paul1 (PAVLVS) (Paulus) (Roman) papacy begins 33 days later.Wiki: List of PopesBrother of Stephen2.
    26Nov757Piedras Negras king It zam K'an Ahk2 reign ends, and Cancuén king Tajal Chan Ahk reign begins.Wiki: Maya rulersTajal Chan Ahk, built the city palace in 770.
    758Japanese 孝謙天皇 [Empress Kōken] reign ends and Japanese 淳仁天皇 [Emperor Junnin] reign begins.Wiki: Emperors of Japan
    758Japanese 岡宮天皇 [Emperor Oka] exists.Wiki: Emperors of JapanCrown Prince who never acceded to the throne. Husband of Empress Genmei. Father of Emperor Monmu and Empress Genshō.
    10Mar758Piedras Negras king Yo'nal Ahk3 reign begins.Wiki: Maya rulersYo'nal Ahk3 AKA Ruler 5
    758Tamna 형왕 (逈王) [King Hyeong] reign ends and 치도왕 (致道王) [King Chido] reign begins.Wiki: Korean Monarchs
    759Japanese 崇道尽敬皇帝 [Emperor Sudōjinkei] exists.Wiki: Emperors of JapanFather of Emperor Junnin
    760Sacul king Ch'iyel and Tamarindito king Chanal Balam reigns begin.Wiki: Maya rulers
    761Copán king K'ak' Yipyaj Chan K'awiil and Machaquila king Ets'nab-Chaak reigns end, and Dos Pilas king K'awiil Chan K'inich was forced to flee and was never mentioned again.Wiki: Maya rulersK'ak' Yipyaj Chan K'awiil, or January 763.
    762Tang emperor 肅宗 [Suzong] reign ends and 代宗 [Daizong] reign begins.Wiki: Chinese monarchs
    762Toniná king K'inich Tuun Chapat reign ends.Wiki: Maya rulersK'inich Tuun Chapat AKA Ruler 6; Ruler 8
    2Jul763Copán king Yax Pasaj Chan Yopaat reign begins.Wiki: Maya rulersYax Pasaj Chan Yopaat AKA Yax Pac, Rising Sun
    764Japanese 淳仁天皇 [Emperor Junnin] dethroned by 称徳天皇 [Empress Shōtoku] (aka Kōken), beginning her second reign.Wiki: Emperors of Japan
    4Mar764Tamarindito king Chanal Balam reign ends and Palanque king K'inich K'uk' Bahlam2 reign begins.Wiki: Maya rulersK'inich K'uk' Bahlam2 AKA Bahlum K'uk'2, Mahk'ina K'uk'
    765Silla 경덕왕 (景德王) [King Gyeongdeok] reign ends and 혜공왕 (惠恭王) [King Hyegong] reign begins.Wiki: Korean Monarchs
    766Tikal king Yik'in Chan K'awiil reign ends and 28th Ruler reign begins.Wiki: Maya rulersLittle is known about this 28th ruler.
    28Jun767Pope St Paul1 papacy ends and Pope Stephen3 (STEPHANVS Tertius) (Stephanus) (Greek) papacy begins 406 days later.Wiki: List of PopesSometimes called Stephen4. He summoned the Lateran Council (769).
    14Feb767Piedras Negras king Yo'nal Ahk3 reign ends and Ha' K'in Xook reign begins.Wiki: Maya rulersHa' K'in Xook AKA Ruler 6
    768CharleMagne becomes King of Francs.(2020) YT: FOL - CharleMagne

    24Jan772Pope Stephen3 papacy ends and Pope Adrian1 (HADRIANVS) (Hadrianus) (Roman) papacy begins 8 days later.Wiki: List of PopesPope during the Second Council of Nicaea (787), the seventh ecumenical council accepted by the Catholic and Eastern Orthodox temples.
    772Sak tz'i king Aj Sak Maax reign ends.Wiki: Maya rulers
    775Machaquila king Chak-Bahlam reign occurs.Wiki: Maya rulersChak-Bahlam 's Monuments: Stela 18

    780Tang emperor 德宗 [Dezong] reign begins.Wiki: Chinese monarchs
    24Mar780Ixtutz king Aj Yaxjal B’aak reign occurs and Piedras Negras king Ha' K'in Xook reign ends and Naranjo king K'ahk' Ukalaw Chan Chaak reign ends and Cobá king Ruling family reign ends.Wiki: Maya rulers

Despite this time gap, there is no evidence anyone was ruling Piedras Negras in the interim. He was later captured by K'inich Tatbu Skull4 of Yaxchilan. AKA Ruler 7
    783Palenque king K'inich K'uk' Bahlam2 reign ends.Wiki: Maya rulers

Leo5 appointed his son Symbatios as co-emperor under the name Constantine on Christmas 813.

    844Vikings attack and plunder Seville (Spain) during the Umayyad Caliphate's control.(2019) YT: VOTP - Viking AttackVikings first landed at Lisbon, clashed with Muslims 3 times in 30 days, then moved down the coast to undefended Seville. "It was a Wednesday." A general Muslim call-to-arms was called, to run the Vikings out of these undefended lands, which Vikings had apparently never attacked before. People rallied at Cordoba under Abd al-Rahman 2, and they mass-uninstalled Vikings until the Vikings realized they were mostly uninstalled, and then the Viking leader was uninstalled, and the Vikings retreated. Total of 40 days of mass-uninstall.
